text: huwa alladhi yusayyirukum fi l-bari wal-bahri hatta idha kuntum fi l-ful'ki wajarayna bihim birihin tayyibatin wafarihu biha jaatha rihun ʿasifun wajaahumu l-mawju min kulli makanin wazannu annahum uhita bihim daʿawu l-laha mukh'lisina lahu l-dina la-in anjaytana min hadhihi lanakunanna mina l-shakirina
